code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[items,setItems]=useState(0);const[packs,setPacks]=useState([]);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:8080/order',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({items})});const data=await response.json();setPacks(data.packs);}catch(error){console.error('Error:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/gymshark-logo.png",alt:"Gymshark Logo",className:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Product Pack Calculator"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Items:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:items,onChange:e=>setItems(Number(e.target.value)),className:"input"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"button",children:"Calculate Packs"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Calculated Packs Needed:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"packs-list",children:packs.map((pack,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"pack-item",children:["Pack Size: ",pack.size]},index))})]});}export default App;
